author: Jerome Delay, Nqobile Ntshangase and Andrew Meldrum / AP
title: South Africa Has First Deaths From Coronavirus as Three-Week Lockdown Begins
description: A shaken South Africa on Friday announced its first two deaths from the coronavirus as the country's cases rose above 1,000.
content:
(JOHANNESBURG) — A shaken South Africa on Friday announced its first two deaths from the coronavirus as the country’s cases rose above 1,000 and a three-week lockdown began, with some police screaming at the homeless on emptying streets.
The health minister … [+4378 chars]
